response.overview: Housemates Tim and Richie butt heads on most things: dirty dishes, late rent, who ate the last of the garlic dip in the fridge. But one hectic morning in the summer of 2008 puts their friendship, and the entire sharehouse, to the test.
response.tagline: They both smell. They both have places to be. Theyâ€™ll need to learn to share.
response.title: Two Guys, One Shower
